sections.explanation: Templates create reusable markup structures. Named slots allow flexible content insertion at designated positions within the template.

sections.explanation: Details elements create native disclosure widgets. The open attribute shows content initially. Nesting creates hierarchical collapsible structures.
Picture elements enable art direction and format selection. Sources are evaluated top-down until a match is found.

sections.code_string: Confirm Action
sections.explanation: Dialog elements create native modals with built-in focus management. Method dialog automatically closes on form submission.

sections.code_string: Format: ABC123
sections.explanation: Pattern attribute uses regex for custom validation. Title provides tooltip text. Aria-describedby links help text for accessibility.

sections.code_string:
<datalist id="browsers">
  <option value="Chrome">Google Chrome</option>
  <option value="Firefox">Mozilla Firefox</option>
</datalist>
<input list="browsers" 
       autocomplete="off"
       placeholder="Type browser name">
sections.explanation: Datalist provides predefined options for inputs. List attribute connects input to datalist. Autocomplete off prevents browser suggestions.
Contenteditable creates editable regions. Spellcheck controls spell checking. Role and aria attributes ensure proper accessibility semantics.

sections.code_string:
<video controls preload="metadata" 
       poster="thumbnail.jpg">
  <source src="video.webm" type="video/webm">
  <source src="video.mp4" type="video/mp4">
  <track kind="subtitles" src="en.vtt" 
         srclang="en" label="English">
</video>
sections.explanation: Multiple sources provide format fallbacks. Track elements add subtitles and captions. Preload metadata loads video information only.

sections.code_string:

sections.explanation: Canvas content provides fallback for non-supporting browsers. Role and aria-label ensure screen reader accessibility for visual content.

sections.code_string:
Drag me!
Drop zone
sections.explanation: Draggable attribute enables drag functionality. DataTransfer carries data between drag source and drop target during operation.

sections.code_string:
<fieldset disabled>
  <legend>Payment Information</legend>
  <label>Card: <input type="text"></label>
  <label>CVV: <input type="password"></label>
  <output for="card cvv" id="status">
    Form disabled
  </output>
</fieldset>
sections.explanation: Fieldset groups related controls and can disable them collectively. Output element displays calculation results or form status updates.
Image maps create clickable regions on images. Different shapes define hotspots. Usemap attribute links image to map definition.

sections.code_string:
<meter value="6" min="0" max="10"
       low="3" high="7" optimum="8">
  6 out of 10
</meter>
<progress value="70" max="100">
  70% complete
</progress>
sections.explanation: Meter shows scalar values within ranges with optimal zones. Progress displays completion percentage for ongoing tasks or processes.
